title: @Meddler Will Sweeper still be able to cast the shadow of Invisible champions?

replies.body: Also out of curiosity, at what point will Riot consider plants to be a failure and worth reverting? I don't expect them to be though I'd be interesting to know Riot's thinking on this.

Yes. All Stealthed Champions, both Invisible and Camouflaged. 

As a side note: Camouflaged will NOT be revealed, only out-lined, so even though Camouflaged is a "weaker" form of Stealth, the Sweeper isn't better against Camouflage than against Invisibility, just has the exact same effect.
